ygData.subject: RE: Queen of Fools
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I am 27th level and have never attacked any guard or otherwise accidentally, but I moved the attack key to the letter q when I first ran the game.  But
ygData.messageBody:
Well I am 27th level and have never attacked any guard or otherwise
accidentally, but I moved the attack key to the letter 'q' when I first ran
the game. But imagine this, I remapped my jump key to 'a', the duck key to
'spacebar', and the Hail key is still 'h'. You are talking to some friends,
they make a joke and you type 'Ha ha' without hitting enter first. Now THAT
makes you look like an idiot. =)
___________________
Robert Maze

robert@...
www.fncinc.com



-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 3:39 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Queen of Fools


From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>

I think everyone has done this. I'm surprised you made it all the way to
level 30 without hitting the 'a' key before now. I remapped mine to the '0'
on the number pad a looooong time ago.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 48 Bard
Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 3:37 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Queen of Fools
Importance: Low


From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>


Just thought I'd share this little tid-bit of idiocy with y'all....

Just yesterday, I finally decided to go get my Lambent Bracer (my first
lambent piece). I contacted my druid friend and had him gate me to
lavastorm. I entered the temple and made my way to the two quest NPC's
(forget their names). I was checking and re-checking, to make sure I had
the correct components/cash. I was asking about all the Lambent pieces -
insuring that my list was still up-to-date. As soon as I typed the 'a' in
lambent, I started attacking the female NPC. I made a futile attempt to
flee, but I made it no further than 10 paces before I became worm food.

My friend asks : "What are you doing in Greater faydark?"
I respond : "You won't believe what I just did..."

Needless to say, that was about the single dumbest thing I've done in this
game yet. Since I was feeling pretty bad about myself (I must admit it was
pretty hilarious though) I wanted to see if any of you fine bards had
boneheaded experiences of your own to share.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar] - I did, eventually, get my bracer

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
